page.title: 15Dennis the bus-driver.
page.content: Dennis has been a bus driver for six years. He drives the buses 71, 73, 6, 7, X71, and X73 for Tyne and Wear Passanger Transport Executive. There are two shifts he can work on - the early shift that starts at 4.15 am or the later shift beginning at 3.30 pm. To get the job of a bus driver you must pass a test and an entrance exam. You have to be 18 before you can be a bus driver. Dennis gets five weeks holiday a year. The Metro train service has made a differance to his job, he picks up less people now at differant times. The bus is like a feeder for the Metro. Dennis likes meeting people on the bus, he dislikes hazzardous traffic and troublemakers. He would not like to work on the metro because they just sit in the cabs alone all day.
